data.name: WWE 2K22 - Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
WWE 2K22’s roster gets even bigger with the Season Pass, featuring 27 additional Superstars spread across 5 DLC packs, featuring the likes of Ronda Rousey, Mr. T, Yokozuna, Logan Paul, and more!

The WWE 2K22 Season Pass, which also includes the MyRISE Mega-Boost with 200 additional Attribute Points, and Supercharger, which unlocks all base-game WWE Legends, features the following packs with playable Superstars:

Banzai Pack
  • Yokozuna
  • Umaga
  • Rikishi
  • Omos
  • Kacy Catanzaro

Most Wanted Pack
  • The Boogeyman
  • Cactus Jack
  • Vader
  • Ilja Dragunov
  • Indi Hartwell

Stand Back Pack
  • The Hurricane
  • Stacy Keibler
  • A-KID
  • Wes Lee
  • Bonus MyFACTION Cards
    • Booker T EVO MyFACTION Card
    • Seth Rollins Sapphire MyFACTION Card

Clowning Around Pack
  • Doink the Clown
  • The British Bulldog
  • Mr. T
  • Doudrop
  • Rick Boogs
  • Ronda Rousey

The Whole Dam Pack
  • RVD
  • MGK
  • LA Knight
  • Xia Li
  • Commander Azeez
  • Sarray
  • Logan Paul

Each playable character also comes with their own EVO MyFACTION card.

The WWE 2K22 Season Pass is already included with the Deluxe Edition and nWo 4-Life Edition.

data.short_description: The Season Pass gives you access to all 5 awesome DLC content packs and unlocks all WWE Legends available at launch. Plus, give your MyRISE Superstar a Mega-Boost with 200 additional Attribute Points.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
